resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157857</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157857</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3300</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of Passive sentences</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung der passiven Programmsätze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation des phrases passives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação de sentenças passivas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione delle frasi passive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός των παθητικών προτάσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de sentencias pasivas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is group work activity on writing sentences in the passive.It consists of a chart the students have to fill in with the help of general rules and is followed by a creative writing assignment as well as an evaluation (rubric)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">passive</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist Gruppe Arbeit, die Aktivität auf 
Schreiben Programmsätzen im passive.It aus einem Diagramm die 
Kursteilnehmer mit Hilfe der allgemeinen Richtlinien ausfüllen 
müssen und wird gefolgt von einer kreativen Schreiben Anweisung sowie
eine Auswertung (Rubrik) besteht</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est groupe que l'activité de travail sur des 
phrases d'écriture dans le passive.It se compose d'un diagramme les 
étudiants doivent compléter avec l'aide des règles générales et 
est suivi d'une affectation créatrice d'écriture aussi bien qu'une 
évaluation (rubrique)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é grupo a atividade do trabalho que em 
sentenças da escrita no passive.It consiste em uma carta os 
estudantes têm que preencher com a ajuda de réguas gerais e é 
seguido por uma atribuição creativa da escrita as.well.as uma 
avaliação (rubric)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è gruppo l'attività del lavoro che sulle 
frasi di scrittura nel passive.It consiste di una tabella gli allievi 
devono riempire con l'aiuto delle regole generali ed è seguita da 
un'assegnazione creativa di scrittura così come una valutazione 
(rubrica)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι δραστηριότητα εργασίας ομάδας στο γράψιμο
των προτάσεων στον παθητικό Αποτελείται από ένα διάγραμμα 
που οι σπουδαστές πρέπει να γεμίσουν μέσα με τη βοήθεια των 
γενικών κανόνων και ακολουθείται από μια δημιουργική ανάθεση 
γραψίματος καθώς επίσης και μια αξιολόγηση (ρουμπρίκα)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es grupo que la actividad del trabajo en 
sentencias de la escritura en el passive.It consiste en una carta los 
estudiantes tienen que completar con la ayuda de reglas generales y es
seguida por una asignación creativa de la escritura así como una 
evaluación (rúbrica)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernenstrategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">passiv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">passif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">passivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie di apprendimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">passivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατηγικές εκμάθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παθητική φωνή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrategias que aprenden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pasivo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
